original: kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag kyang dre dang ro dang reg bya la nye bar rgyu ba yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa dag kyang dre dang ro dang reg bya la nye bar rgyu ba yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Also, those that arise in the form realm and focus on the desire realm would not be called those that are attracted to odor, taste, and tangible objects.

original: dri la sogs pa ni de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dri la sogs pa ni de'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because odor, etc. are not its objects.

original: ji ltar ches gsal ba de ltar bshad ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dmigs pa'i mngon sum du byas pa'i yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba rnams ni ches gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji ltar ches gsal ba de ltar bshad ces bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dmigs pa'i mngon sum du byas pa'i yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba rnams ni ches gsal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are explained in the order in which they are most clear. Those mental activities that are attracted to form, etc. as their objects are the most clear, because they are direct perception.

original: gang gzugs dag mthong nas de dang lhan gcig 'byung ba'i sgra rnams la nye bar rgyu ba de yang de'i yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba ni yong mod kyi ji ltar mi 'chol ba de ltar bshad do //🔽ji ltar na mi 'chol zhen dbang po dang don @302a * //
analyzed: gang gzugs dag mthong nas de dang lhan gcig 'byung ba'i sgra rnams la nye bar rgyu ba de yang de'i yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba ni yong mod kyi ji ltar mi 'chol ba de ltar bshad do // ji ltar na mi 'chol zhen dbang po dang don @302a * //
translated: When one sees forms, one is also attracted to the sounds that occur simultaneously with them. However, that mental activity is not explained in a way that is mixed up with the others.🔽How is it not mixed up?

original: rnam par chad pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rnam par chad pa'i sgo nas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “From the point of view of the separation of the sense faculty and object.”

original: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnam par chad pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa don rnam par chad pa'i sgo nas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnam par chad pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa don rnam par chad pa'i sgo nas bshad pa yin no //
translated: The Sūtra explains that the eye faculty, etc. are the basis of the eye consciousness, etc. in terms of the distinction of the sense faculty and in terms of the distinction of the object field.🔽If it were otherwise, the following statement would be incoherent: “Having seen forms with the eye, he is attracted to those forms that are the basis of joy. ”🔽The Sūtra explains that the eye faculty, etc. are the basis of the eye consciousness, etc. in terms of the distinction of the sense faculty and in terms of the distinction of the object field.

original: de lta ma yin na mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu'i sgra rnams la nye bar rgyu'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa ni 'chol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na mig gis gzugs dag mthong nas yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu'i sgra rnams la nye bar rgyu'o zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa ni 'chol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were otherwise, the following statement would be incoherent: “Having seen forms with the eye, he is attracted to those forms that are the basis of joy. ”

original: rgyud nges pas ni yod ces bya ba ni 'di ltar sems can 'ga'i rgyud la ltos nas ni la la yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu kho na yin pa nas btang snyoms kyi gnas lta bu kho na'i bar du ni yin no //🔽dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyud nges pas ni yod ces bya ba ni 'di ltar sems can 'ga'i rgyud la ltos nas ni la la yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu kho na yin pa nas btang snyoms kyi gnas lta bu kho na'i bar du ni yin no // dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The Sūtra explains that the eye faculty, etc. are the basis of the eye consciousness, etc. in terms of the distinction of the sense faculty and in terms of the distinction of the object field.🔽If it were otherwise, the following statement would be incoherent: “Having seen forms with the eye, he is attracted to those forms that are the basis of joy. ”

original: ci zhe na nges pas so //
analyzed: ci zhe na nges pas so //
translated: The Sūtra explains that the eye faculty, etc. are the basis of the eye consciousness, etc. in terms of the distinction of the sense faculty and in terms of the distinction of the object field.🔽If it were otherwise, the following statement would be incoherent: “Having seen forms with the eye, he is attracted to those forms that are the basis of joy. ”

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽dmigs pa de nyid la la'i yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu yin la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / dmigs pa de nyid la la'i yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu yin la /
translated: The Sūtra explains that the eye faculty, etc. are the basis of the eye consciousness, etc. in terms of the distinction of the sense faculty and in terms of the distinction of the object field.🔽If it were otherwise, the following statement would be incoherent: “Having seen forms with the eye, he is attracted to those forms that are the basis of joy. ”

original: la la'i ma yin no //
analyzed: la la'i ma yin no //
translated: The Sūtra explains that the eye faculty, etc. are the basis of the eye consciousness, etc. in terms of the distinction of the sense faculty and in terms of the distinction of the object field.🔽If

original: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i bar zhes bya ba ni du zhig ni gzugs kyi khams dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i bar zhes bya ba ni du zhig ni gzugs kyi khams dang ldan pa yin /
translated: So too, up to those associated with the form and formless realms.

original: de dag las kyang du zhig gi dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de dag las kyang du zhig gi dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin /
translated: How many are associated with the form realm?

original: du zhig ni gzugs med pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: du zhig ni gzugs med pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin /
translated: How many are associated with the formless realm?

original: de dag las kyang du zhig gi dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'o /🔽// / bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa /
analyzed: de dag las kyang du zhig gi dmigs pa ni ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'o / // / bam po nyi shu rtsa bdun pa /
translated: How many of those have what as their object?

original: 'dod na thams cad rang dmigs can //
analyzed: 'dod na thams cad rang dmigs can //
translated: All in the desire realm have their own realm as their object.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na ni yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba 'dod pa na spyod pa bco brgyad po thams cad yod la de dag thams cad kyi dmigs pa yang 'dod pa'i khams de nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na ni yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba 'dod pa na spyod pa bco brgyad po thams cad yod la de dag thams cad kyi dmigs pa yang 'dod pa'i khams de nyid yin no //
translated: In the desire realm, all eighteen types of mental application that occur in the desire realm exist and all of them have the desire realm as their object.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa'i tshig ni 'di dag la dmigs pa rang gi khams yod pas na rang dmigs can no zhes bya ba tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa'i tshig ni 'di dag la dmigs pa rang gi khams yod pas na rang dmigs can no zhes bya ba tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The term “those that have their own realm as their object” is a compound word.

original: spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so //
translated: Twelve have form as their object.

original: zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nye bar rgyu ba bcu gnyis kyi spyod yul yin no //🔽dri dang ro la nye bar rgyu ba drug ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni dri dang ro la dmigs pa'i yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba gnyis ma gtogs pa dang / de dag kho na la dmigs pa'i yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba gnyis ma gtogs pa dang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nye bar rgyu ba bcu gnyis kyi spyod yul yin no // dri dang ro la nye bar rgyu ba drug ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni dri dang ro la dmigs pa'i yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba gnyis ma gtogs pa dang / de dag kho na la dmigs pa'i yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba gnyis ma gtogs pa dang /
translated: The form realm is the domain of the twelve that operate in the desire realm.🔽The six that operate on smell and taste are excluded.

original: de dag kho na la dmigs pa'i btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba gnyis ma gtogs @302b zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag kho na la dmigs pa'i btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba gnyis ma gtogs @302b zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The six that operate on smell and taste are excluded, the two that operate on smell and taste that are mental satisfaction are excluded, the two that operate on smell and taste that are mental dissatisfaction are excluded, and the two that operate on smell and taste that are equanimity are excluded.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why are they excluded?🔽The Abhidharmakosa states,

original: dri dang ro dang sna dang ni //
analyzed: dri dang ro dang sna dang ni //
translated: The form realm excludes the smell and taste,

original: lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs //
analyzed: lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs //
translated: and the nose and tongue consciousness elements.

original: zhes 'byung bas gzugs kyi khams de ni dri dang ro de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas gzugs kyi khams de ni dri dang ro de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The form realm excludes smell and taste because those two do not exist there.

original: gong ma gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni khams gong ma ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms chos la nye bar rgyu ba gsum gyi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gong ma gsum gyi zhes bya ba ni khams gong ma ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms chos la nye bar rgyu ba gsum gyi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The phrase “the three higher realms” refers to the three types of mental satisfaction, mental dissatisfaction, and equanimity that occur in the realm of desire.

original: de na gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na gzugs la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are the objects of the three types of mental satisfaction, mental dissatisfaction, and equanimity that occur in the higher realms, because form, etc., do not exist in those realms.

original: bsam gtan ni gnyis na bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni gnyis na bcu gnyis zhes bya ba ni yid mi bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba drug med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “in the two meditative states of composure” means in the meditative states of composure without conception and the meditative state of composure that is a cessation.

original: rang la dmigs brgyad ces bya ba ni brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang la dmigs brgyad ces bya ba ni brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The phrase “the eight that have themselves as their object” means that they have the eight that occur in the same meditative state of composure as their objects.

original: dri dang ro la nye bar rgyu ba bzhi ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba dri la dmigs pa gnyis dang / rol dmigs pa gnyis ma gtogs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
analyzed: dri dang ro la nye bar rgyu ba bzhi ma gtogs zhes bya ba ni yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba dri la dmigs pa gnyis dang / rol dmigs pa gnyis ma gtogs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
translated: The phrase “with the exception of the four that have smell and taste as their objects” means that they do not have the two that have smell as their objects and the two that have taste as their objects.

original: de na de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because those two types of mental factors do not exist in those two meditative states of composure.

original: gzugs med pa gnyis kyi ste zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms chos la nye bar rgyu ya dag gi dmigs pa yin te gzugs la sogs pa ni med pa'i phyir ro
analyzed: gzugs med pa gnyis kyi ste zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa'i yid bde ba dang btang snyoms chos la nye bar rgyu ya dag gi dmigs pa yin te gzugs la sogs pa ni med pa'i phyir ro
translated: The formless realm is the object of two mental applications of equanimity that are concomitant with the mental faculty of the first and second absorptions, because form and so on do not exist there.🔽There are only six mental applications of equanimity,🔽but others do not exist there.

original: // btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug kho na yod kyi gzhan dag ni med do zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos la dmigs pa dag kho na yod do //
analyzed: // btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba drug kho na yod kyi gzhan dag ni med do zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang chos la dmigs pa dag kho na yod do //
translated: There are only six mental applications of equanimity that focus on form, sound, smell, taste, tactility, and phenomena.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bzhi pa ni yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba rnams kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bzhi pa ni yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba rnams kyang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The third and fourth absorptions do not have mental applications of joy because joy is not included in those two absorptions.

original: de na dri dang ro la dmigs pa dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dri dang ro la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de na dri dang ro la dmigs pa dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i dri dang ro la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: You should understand that those that focus on smell and taste focus on the smell and taste of the desire realm.

original: de na ni bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs te bar chad med pa'i lam gyi dmigs pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de na ni bzhi'o zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs te bar chad med pa'i lam gyi dmigs pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: In the base of infinite space, there are four, because the object field of the uninterrupted path of access concentration to the base of infinite space is the fourth absorption.

original: de na yang gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya dang chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na yang gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya dang chos yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And there, form, sound, tactility, and dharma exist.

original: gang gi ltar na de rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa yod pa'i yin zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gang dag gi gzhung lugs kyis /
analyzed: gang gi ltar na de rnam par chad pa la dmigs pa yod pa'i yin zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gang dag gi gzhung lugs kyis /
translated: According to those who assert that it focuses on the disintegrated state,

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched @303a * //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched @303a * //
translated: the object field of the access concentration to the base of infinite space is the fourth absorption.

original: kyi nyer bsdogs de rnam par chad pa la dmigs shing gzugs la sogs pa so so la dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: kyi nyer bsdogs de rnam par chad pa la dmigs shing gzugs la sogs pa so so la dmigs pa yin te /
translated: It focuses on the disintegrated state of the fourth absorption and focuses on form and so on individually,

original: spyir mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: spyir mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because it does not focus on the fourth absorption in general.

original: slob dpon kha cig gi gzhung lugs ltar na ni /
analyzed: slob dpon kha cig gi gzhung lugs ltar na ni /
translated: According to the system of some masters,

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la reg pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la reg pa la sogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: the object field of the access concentration to the base of infinite space is the fourth absorption and it focuses on tactility and so on.

original: slob dpon gang dag gi gzhung lugs kyis bzlums te dmigs pa kho na ste nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i phung po lnga char la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon de dag gi ltar
analyzed: slob dpon gang dag gi gzhung lugs kyis bzlums te dmigs pa kho na ste nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs de bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i phung po lnga char la dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon de dag gi ltar
translated: The masters who assert that the object field of the access concentration to the base of infinite space is the five aggregates of the fourth absorption level,

original: na ni de na chos la nye bar rgyu ba'i 'dres pa la dmigs pa gcig kho na yod do //
analyzed: na ni de na chos la nye bar rgyu ba'i 'dres pa la dmigs pa gcig kho na yod do //
translated: according to those masters, there is only one mixed object field of the investigation of phenomena in the fourth absorption.

original: gong mar 'gro ba gcig ces bya ba ni gang gi phyogs /🔽gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi //🔽zhes bya ba yin pa de dag gi phyogs yin no //🔽gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi rnams kyi ma yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi rnams kyi dmigs pa ni khams 'og ma ma yin te /
analyzed: gong mar 'gro ba gcig ces bya ba ni gang gi phyogs / gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi // zhes bya ba yin pa de dag gi phyogs yin no // gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi rnams kyi ma yin zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi rnams kyi dmigs pa ni khams 'og ma ma yin te /
translated: One proceeding to the higher is one who proceeds to the formless realm.🔽The formless realm is the object field of the access concentrations to the formless realm.🔽The formless realm is the object field of the access concentrations to the formless realm.

original: sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la mi dmigs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The formless actual bases do not have lower realms as their object field.🔽The formless actual bases do not have lower realms as their object field because they do not focus on contaminated things of lower levels.

original: 'og nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This will be explained below.

original: gzugs med dngos gzhi dge ba yi //
analyzed: gzugs med dngos gzhi dge ba yi //
translated: The actual basis of the formless realm is virtuous.

original: spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min //🔽zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min // zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Its object field is not contaminated lower levels.🔽The first absorption and so on is the extensive presentation.

original: bsam gtan dang po dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa ni brgyad dang ldan no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sa pa ni brgyad dang ldan no //
translated: Those of the level of the first and second absorptions possess eight.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa ni bzhi dang ldan no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i sa pa ni bzhi dang ldan no //
translated: Those of the level of the third and fourth absorptions possess four.

original: gang dag dang zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag dang zhe na /
translated: With what?

original: smras pa / dri dang ro la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa nyon mongs pa can rnams dang ste /
analyzed: smras pa / dri dang ro la dmigs pa ma gtogs pa nyon mongs pa can rnams dang ste /
translated: It is said: Those that focus on smell and taste are excluded, but those that are afflicted exist there.

original: de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because smell and taste do not exist there.

original: ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag na yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bcu gnyis yod par bshad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dag na yid kyi nye bar rgyu ba bcu gnyis yod par bshad ce na /
translated: How is it that twelve mental applications exist in the first and second absorptions?

original: yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba rnams kyi dmigs pa yul drug rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba rnams kyi dmigs pa yul drug rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the six objects are posited as the focal objects of mental satisfaction and equanimity.

original: de la 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems ma thob pa ni rang gi sa pa la dmigs pa yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya dang chos la dmigs pa nyon mongs pa can bzhi dang /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa gzugs na spyod pa'i dge ba'i sems ma thob pa ni rang gi sa pa la dmigs pa yid bde ba'i nye bar rgyu ba gzugs dang sgra dang reg bya dang chos la dmigs pa nyon mongs pa can bzhi dang /
translated: Those born in the desire realm who have not obtained a virtuous mind of the form realm focus on four afflicted objects of the desire realm: pleasure equanimity that focus on form, sound, tactility and phenomena of their level.

original: btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba nyon mongs @303b pa can bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag kho na dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi nye bar rgyu ba nyon mongs @303b pa can bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag kho na dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Those born in the desire realm who have not obtained a virtuous mind of the form realm possess four afflicted mental factors focusing on form, sound, tactility and phenomena that focus on the level of their desire realm level and four afflicted neutral factors.
